BHARATI HOSPITAL¬†is a 200-beded, multi-specialty Hospital located in Saraipali town of Mahasamund District (Chhattisgarh). The foundation was laid by Mr. Viswajit Gupta under guidance of Shri Jaynarayan Gupta & Dr. Bharat Kumar Gupta with a view to provide cost-effective, high-quality medical services, at par with Corporate Hospitals for the general public.

Within a radius of 60 km surrounding Saraipali, with a population of about 10 lakhs , there is virtually no basic, healthcare facility. There are many situations where the local people have suffered due to lack of immediate, medical attention or regular and timely monitoring. This was frequently happening on account of distance, non-availability of transportation, lack of healthcare facilities and financial inability to access emergency health facilities. We have now attempted to mitigate this problem by providing healthcare services to the under-served surroundings of SARAIPALI, for all sections, with proper infrastructure, equipment, skilled and experienced doctors and paramedical staff.

Bharati Hospital¬†is ideally located in the heart of the Saraipali town and is easily accessible to the neighboring areas. The Hospital is equipped with the latest, hi-tech, precision instruments, modern infrastructure, good trauma and critical-care facilities, three ‚Äòstate of art‚Äô Operation Theatres, latest diagnostic services, comfortable and homely ‚Äòin-patient‚Äô facilities and ambience, ‚Äòround-the-clock‚Äô patient-care and monitoring.

The campus inculcates the facility of Diet canteen along with an eco-friendly atmosphere for the patients , staffs, doctors & attendants. The Hospital shall provide ‚Äòround the clock‚Äô services and will cater to the health needs of the public of the entire SARAIPALI belt of Mahasamund district, Chhattisgarh and other contiguous areas.

Standby power generators with protective ‚ÄòOnline‚Äô UPS systems have been made available. The Central Sterilization Department, for infection control ,has been established to meet the demands of all departments. A ‚ÄòLift‚Äô facility makes life easier for non-ambulatory patients. A Dialysis unit for kidney ailments is also available for regular, patient treatment. The hospital also provides living-quarters for essential staff such as Doctors and other paramedical staff.

It may be noted that there is no modern, medical diagnostic centre in the in the entire district. To address this lacunae, the hospital has established good, diagnostic services by acquiring advanced diagnostic equipment. This includes radiology, ultrasound, ECG and other automatic Analyzers.

Bharati Hospital which is situated in bharati Vidyapeeths with eleven state of art super specialized operation theatres and well supporting system, where patients are admitted and operated for major surgeries. I didn't even feel like giving this one star for the experience at the radiology department.
Few days back my mother was struck with a paralysis stroke (and if you know paralysis strikes the left side of the body), she was sent to the from the emergency ward at midnight around 1:30am. She had an urge to pee and was asking for a bed pan.
But the nurses there started making excuses, we don't have a bed pan in the department/there's no aya available and nonsense excuses for that matter.

She was cringing in pain due to not being able to control her bladder while me literally going around asking for bedpan because the staff was reluctant, she peed in the stretcher in her clothes.
She was then taken for CT scan and MRI in the same condition.
I am disgusted with this inhuman service.

I would appreciate the doctors and their medical attention but the sisters/nurses have no ethics and are inhuman for that matter.

Bharati Hospital and Research Centre is an 831 bed tertiary care multispecialty hospital located on Pune-Satara Road which provide quality medical care at affordable cost. Established on 25 Jan 1994 and housed in a multi stored building spanning more than 3.5 lakh square feet. Bharati Hospital and Research Centre provides basic, speciality and superspeciality services to its clientele under one roof. It is run by Bharati Vidyapeeth Medical Foundation and is affiliated with Bharati Vidyapeeth Deemed University Medical College for teaching purposes. Breast cancer (especially in menopause); breast cancer (including in men after castration); kidney cancer; melanoma and soft tissue sarcoma containing estrogen receptors; ovarian cancer, endometrial cancer. OUR VISION: Centre of excellence in patient care and medical education. OUR MISSION: We provide advanced and compassionate patient care & world class education to future health care professionals. QUALITY POLICY: Our team of Hospital aims towards achieving utmost Patients‚Äô satisfaction and Positive Health, through Continuous Quality improvement, adhering to Safety standards and legal norms

Hello team,  Thank you for your attention towards my review regarding Bharati hospital Dr. And staff, recently my Dad was admitted in Bharati hospital due to covid positive, he has underlying diseases of Ckd and diabetes, BP. Dr has took care of him. Perfectly. They have guided us very nicely and friendly, but worst thing I'm giving negative marking is negligance of Ward staff and nurses.  My dad had Bedsore and they completely ignore it. After some. Days when we shifted to noncovid Ward, in that unit they identify it was bedsores and started treatment.

Worst experience, few days before, my father undergone a leg surgery. Doctors suggested surgery was good. Within a week time he found infected with pseudomonas bacteria, again they have admitted my father for 10 days for treatment and discharged saying it was cured. Again after 1 week same infection was detected and doctors again claimed to admit.
Worst part is, in the blood and other reports which was done at time interval of 20 days, only date is changed other results are exactly copy of each other. We suspect they have only changed the date on the report.
Is this way Bharti hospital cheat the patients.....????
Is this a good medical practises of these doctors...???
We will definitely take a legal action against this.

my mom has waited 1 hour for MRI she is shouting due to high pain. We requested to them. And than they took her inside. Again they waited 45 min.. and started MRI .. they getting difficulties while MRI .. machine is very poor quality.. it has very larg sound. Finished 1 and half hour, than we went home, next day we went of that orthopaedics dr, again they were playing ludo in larg group, I requested the  should we come than he told us to wait few minutes, and we waited 20 to 15 minutes outside, they were nothing doing any important work, they were playing ludo, and we waited like the joker, my mom she started shouting due to pain and than I requested again then they permitted. We were shown them that MRI, they said it has muscles tear, but u should check up with spinal cord doctor,  there is the issue with the spinal , nerv vains.. and told us to please go and take the case paper, and than come. While speaking they were not concentrating and playing ludo.. and not given appropriate suggestion. Than we went at hardiker hospital.. spinal cord dr. Check thoes MRI and tell that it's not cause for spinal, it's a muscle tear and suggested some excersize and medication.

Hospital is meant for hospitality and is quite enough. But patient's relative attendants have very poor facilities. Washrooms are insufficient and pretty dirty while housekeeping records are up to date. Hospital has proud to outsource the hospitality services from most reputed agencies like BVG but still the utilities for attendants and relatives is not even satisfactory to use. Surprisingly the toilets in front of the hospitality office is the best example for review.
Now a days many private medical stores offering discounts on medicines. Medical store in campus charges MRP. Being charitable hospital generic medicines are to be promoted for the benefit of needy and poor families.
Food available in canteens may be good but not for patients. These are running totally business and not for hospitalized patients.
Otherwise everything is the best....

Best option to purchase Medicines is " SAI MEDICAL" just on left  road of this hospital. Fifty percent discount.

Cost of treatment is very high here. hospital is quite good maintained but the doctors here are not very cooperative.They charge very high for everything.if your hands are fractured they will charge you 15000-17000 rs and will keep you in hospital for 1 week without any reason and charge you for no reasons.if you don't have any other choice you can come here for medical treatment

Bharat Hospital is managed very badly.  If you are a poor person and admitted for an operation, then only God can help you because after the operation, the surgeon will not even meet the patient, the entire hospital is run by student doctors who have not completed their degrees.  The nursing staff is so poor and many who have had surgeries have had post-op infections and have had to be re-admitted.

Hospital campus is extremely large.
Ample space for parking.
Few medical stores are also available in the campus.
All types of medical facilities provided.
Doctors, Nursing staff, other people very helpful.
Affiliated to almost all health insurance companies, So cashless billing facility available.
Accepts Credit/Debit card payments everywhere.
Two canteens also located inside the campus, With pantry stall present on each floor.

I have been to Bharati Hospital for RTPCR test but staff behaved rudely ......no one was answering properly ....and finely they didn't provide me RTPCR result on mail........"we never provide results on mail, you need to come and collect results on second day " this was answer by staff....I have a question how you are handling covid 19 situation. Bharati Hospital and Research Centre is an 831 bed tertiary care multispecialty hospital located on Pune-Satara Road which provide quality medical care at affordable cost.

Established on 25 Jan 1994 and housed in a multi stored building spanning more than 3.5 lakh square feet. Bharati Hospital and Research Centre provides basic, speciality and superspeciality services to its clientele under one roof.

It is run by Bharati Vidyapeeth Medical Foundation and is affiliated with Bharati Vidyapeeth Deemed University Medical College for teaching purposes. Breast cancer (especially in menopause); breast cancer (including in men after castration); kidney cancer; melanoma and soft tissue sarcoma containing estrogen receptors; ovarian cancer, endometrial cancer.
